\section{Module hal.tests.utils}

\end{alltt}

  \subsection{Functions}

    \label{hal:tests:utils:battery_test}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.tests \textit{(package)}!hal.tests.utils \textit{(module)}!hal.tests.utils.battery\_test \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{battery\_test}(\textit{assert\_type}, \textit{tests}, \textit{function}, \textit{args}={\tt None})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

:param assert\_type: function
    Type of assert
:param tests: dict
    key= params in function, value= what should be the result
:param function: function
    Function to apply
:param args: *
    Extra args for function to call
:return: bool
    True iff all tests pass
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{hal:tests:utils:random_name}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.tests \textit{(package)}!hal.tests.utils \textit{(module)}!hal.tests.utils.random\_name \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}

    Pseudo-random name
\end{alltt}
